title: ICE from variant_size_differences warning inside macro

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Causing a `variant_size_differences` warning inside a macro causes an ICE:

https://play.rust-lang.org/?gist=41ea0d892ce34eceee7a&version=stable

On nightly:

```
rustc 1.8.0-nightly (3623797eb 2016-02-07)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 3623797ebb9674322c4cfcfb0bb7b002afe17f11
commit-date: 2016-02-07
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.8.0-nightly
```

```
src/lib.rs:50:9: 55:10 warning: enum variant is more than three times larger (24 bytes) than the next largest (ignoring padding)
src/lib.rs:50         pub enum $ident {
src/lib.rs:51             $(
src/lib.rs:52                 #[$vmeta]
src/lib.rs:53                 $variant($ty),
src/lib.rs:54             )+
src/lib.rs:55         }
src/lib.rs:89:1: 98:2 note: in this expansion of error_enum! (defined in src/lib.rs)
src/lib.rs:1:9: 1:33 note: lint level defined here
src/lib.rs:1 #![warn(variant_size_differences)]
                     ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
src/lib.rs:96:10: 53:30 note: this variant is the largest
(internal compiler error: unprintable span)
src/lib.rs:89:1: 98:2 note: in this expansion of error_enum! (defined in src/lib.rs)
```

---

On stable:

```
rustc 1.6.0 (c30b771ad 2016-01-19)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: c30b771ad9d44ab84f8c88b80c25fcfde2433126
commit-date: 2016-01-19
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.6.0
```

```
src/lib.rs:50:9: 55:10 warning: enum variant is more than three times larger (24 bytes) than the next largest (ignoring padding)
src/lib.rs:50         pub enum $ident {
src/lib.rs:51             $(
src/lib.rs:52                 #[$vmeta]
src/lib.rs:53                 $variant($ty),
src/lib.rs:54             )+
src/lib.rs:55         }
src/lib.rs:89:1: 98:2 note: in this expansion of error_enum! (defined in src/lib.rs)
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no entry found for key', ../src/libcore/option.rs:335
stack backtrace:
```
